Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/18 PM: What a beautiful day we had! As you may be aware, significant weather conditions are forecast for tonight through tomorrow evening. Current predictions indicate less than one inch of rain, wind gusts reaching up to 70 mph, followed by a flash freeze and concluding with 1-2 inches of snowfall. In response to these conditions, all natural terrain will be closed tomorrow. Our grooming team will be working throughout the night and into tomorrow morning to prepare all open terrain for operations on Friday. Due to anticipated high winds, lift closures are expected. We will provide updates on our Mountain Report as conditions develop. As temperatures drop on Friday, our snowmaking team will be back in full operation across the mountain. We appreciate your understanding as we prioritize safety during this weather event! 

On Friday, our team will open up 48 trails, all of which will be groomed overnight as well as in the morning. We will start the day with 7 lifts spinning at 9AM, but with that anticipated high winds expect delays/closures. Please note there will be no novice skiing tomorrow as conditions are changing quickly. 

We will keep you all updated on lifts, trails and conditions throughout the day. Be sure to keep a close eye on the Mountain Report. 

Lodging deal Alert! Founders Lodge is now 40% off until December 22! So what are you waiting for BOOK NOW for your best winter trip yet!

Safety Tip: Look uphill and yield when merging.

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee it.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
